entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
